articles.title: About us
articles.body: Trident Modular Housing produce and assemble modular houses that are very high quality and they can be used as temporary as well as permanent residence.
articles.info: An enterprise combining the joint expertise of a UK-based chartered architectural practice and an experienced Ukrainian manufacturer
